sentences.en: Administrative personnel should also acquire some technical skills.
sentences.cn: 管理人员也应该学几门手艺.

sentences.en: Administrative practice generally follows the judicial model in allocating burdens of proof.
sentences.cn: 在分配举证责任方面,行政实践通常遵循司法模式.

sentences.en: Even administrative regulations must be accompanied by persuasion and education.
sentences.cn: 就是行政命令也要伴以说服教育.

sentences.en: He has a lot of administrative work to do.
sentences.cn: 他有许多行政工作要做.

sentences.en: He is among the few aspirants with administrative experience.
sentences.cn: 他是为数不多的几个志向远大而且有管理经验的人之一。

sentences.en: He regarded all these administrative details as beneath his notice.
sentences.cn: 他认为行政管理上的这些琐事都不值一顾.

sentences.en: In administrative adjudications , however, the crucial evidence is usually opinion testimony.
sentences.cn: 然而在行政裁决里, 关键证据通常是意见证据.

sentences.en: In practice a graduate tax is an administrative nightmare.
sentences.cn: 毕业税具体操作起来不啻一场行政噩梦。

sentences.en: Other industries have had to sack managers to reduce administrative costs.
sentences.cn: 其他行业只得精简管理人员以减少行政开支。

sentences.en: Quotas of the means of production are allocated by the higher administrative bodies to the lower ones.
sentences.cn: 物资指标按隶属关系分配.

sentences.en: The complex administrative arrangements render the decision - making process somewhat opaque.
sentences.cn: 复杂的行政协商使决策过程透明度不高.
这份工作主要是行政方面的。

sentences.en: The rapid expansion of administrative rulemaking may also be a factor.
sentences.cn: 行政规则制定的迅速扩展或许也是原因之一.

sentences.en: This was just an administrative cock-up.
sentences.cn: 这纯粹是管理上的混乱。

sentences.en: We deem very highly of his administrative talent.
sentences.cn: 我们非常看重他的管理才能.

sentences.en: We're trying to ratchet down the administrative costs.
sentences.cn: 我们正在想法控制管理成本。

words.tran_cn: 管理；行政；实施；行政机构
给予帮助；执行遗产管理人的职责；担当管理人

phrases.tran_cn: 办公室，行政管理办公室
行政法规；管理行政规定（administrative rule的复数）

trans.tran_en: relating to the work of managing a company or organization
